page.title: 11Glassgreen Farm.
page.content: Mr Adam the owner of Glassgreen Farm has 210 acres of land and only one worker to help him on the farm.Mr Adam grows 70 acres of winter barley which is sown in late autumn and grows throughout winter.There are also 85 acres of spring barley and 50 acres of grass mainly for the cattle to feed on and on the last 5 acres of land he grows carrots. On Glassgreen farm there are 75 cattle, 21 lambs and 12 ewes. To mark the cattle they use an ear_tag which they put in the right ear. On the tag is a number the same as the cattles mother, so if it is ill they know who its mother was. There is a variety of machinery including tractors ,combine harvesters,ploughs,rotovators and several bogies to transport grain.
